projects.name: chrysaetosapp.com
projects.desc: Mobile-first web products to control and improve bar/restaurant businesses.

desc: Gather requirements from business owners and translate them into feature specs and documentation.

highlights.desc: Design the database model and document data definitions and schema.
Design and develop with Test Driven Development a REST API that the different client apps can interact with.
Implement 3 Single Page Application clients for the different services and products for Owners, Managers, and Employees with differet roles.

projects.name: G5 Integrations
projects.desc: Software and marketing solutions for Real Estate companies.

highlights.desc: Update one of the core integration gems for a major vendor to use the MITS 4.0 standard.
Implement upgrade to MITS 4.0 gem in the inventory-etl, vendor-lead-pull, and g5-vendor-leads services.
Add pagination to integrations dashboard for pulled jobs with infinite scroll.

projects.name: InVision
projects.desc: A web application to manage data for a social sciences research company.

highlights.desc: Implement full-text search inside attached files (.xls, .pdf, .doc, etc) using a hosted Elasticsearch instance and within a React component.
Refactor role-based views using cancancan gem. Implement new roles and permissions.
Refactor search bar templates and partials into reusable React component.
Refactor code for search functionality and rake data management tasks to use a more object-oriented and modular approach.

projects.name: afar.com
projects.desc: An online magazine for world travelers.

highlights.desc: Refactor old jQuery-based CRM tool for managing places into set of 10+ reusable React components integrating Google Maps and Places API.
Redesign UI flow for one of the most used CMS tools for managing places in the site to make it load faster, work correctly, and easier to use.
Develop new features, pages, and rake tasks for managing content and processes.

projects.name: Queue
projects.desc: A marketing SaaS for managing online social contests for thousands of users and big clients.

highlights.desc: Manage staging and production environments. Fix and improve configuration for AWS services. Manage project git flow and deployments. Fix production issues.
Implement features in a fast-paced environment integrating APIs for multiple social platforms. Fix issues with changing Facebook APIs.
Start implementation of React refactoring of app and roadmap for serverless refactoring.

projects.name: Chipcode
projects.desc: A git repository management webapp to manage and distribute code for their clients, such as Samsung and Google.

highlights.desc: Convert repository dashboard view from Rails to a set of reusable Backbone and React components that consume a JSON-based API.
Implement repository search in Solr with HTTP in a Backbone module.

projects.name: BrightCRM
projects.desc: A custom web-based CRM for Bright People, a career, talent, and business coaching business.

highlights.desc: Design and implement database, controllers, and views for managing agenda, clients, todos, sessions, and payments.
Implement real-time feature for assigned todos and sessions in agenda.
Design and implement data aggregation displayed in graphs for payments analysis.

projects.name: sellthatcontract.com
projects.desc: An online platform for selling and buying discounted rent contracts.

highlights.desc: Design database, models, view and controlers for managing users, listings, payments, and many other features.
Implement features using third-party APIs like Stripe for payments, Google Maps API for listings, and Sendgrid for all transactional emails.
Setup and manage application hosting, versioning, and deployments in Heroku.
Implement interactive parts of the application for code disccounts, payment cart, slideshows, etc.

projects.name: Kalood
projects.desc: A startup online platform for sharing and finding the best deals online.

highlights.desc: Implement infinite scroll/pagination for newsfeed page.
Design primary newsfeed items view and implement it in the front-end, embedded on PHP Smary templates.
Implement interactive functions to items (view counts, likes, etc).

projects.name: BYU Learning Suite
projects.desc: An in-house web-based learning management system to replace Blackboard in the university.
projects.employer: BYU Center for Teaching and Learning

highlights.desc: Promote implementation of Backbone.js modules for front-end instead of PHP templates. Research best practices and teach the framework to other developers.
Create custom jQuery plugins for the application like date and time pickers, data templating, and table sorting.
Create and maintaing a styleguide for the project (css and jquery plugins), with live-code examples.
Refactor global and inline css sass, HTML5-compliant, and semantic, modules.
